remarks: An equality theorem tailored for ~ ballotlemsf1o (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ifeqeqx.1 $e |- ( x = X -> A = C ) $.
ifeqeqx.2 $e |- ( x = Y -> B = a ) $.
ifeqeqx.3 $e |- ( x = X -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
ifeqeqx.4 $e |- ( x = Y -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
ifeqeqx.5 $e |- ( ph -> a = C ) $.
ifeqeqx.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> th ) $.
ifeqeqx.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
ifeqeqx.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. W ) $.
ifeqeqx $p |- ( ( ph /\ x = if ( ps , X , Y ) ) -> a = if ( ch , A , B ) ) $.
$d C x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d a x $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
